lines: O NOW I SEE THE CRIMSON WAVE
1. Vona Gandlati Ro Tshwuka, Xihlovo Xo Enta;
Ri Pfa Mbangeni Ya Yesu, Yena Muponisi
Xihlovo Lexi Hlantswaka, Ndza Nghena, Ndzi Basisiwa; Xikwembu A Xi Khensiwe,
2. Vona Swivumbiwa Swintshwa, Swi Hlantswe Hi Ngati;
3. Ndzi Ya Eku Vonakalen, Kule Ni Vudyoho;
Na Mbilu Yanga Yo Tenga, Xiluvelo Xakwe.
4. Ta Hlamarisa Tintswalo, Loko Hi Hlantswiwa; Xihlamariso Xa Yesu,
